name: suggested_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v3_v2.
Tool description: Get youtube data without any youtube data api key
API description: Fetches suggested videos related to a specified video from the YouTube API.

type.description: The type of the resource being searched for.

part.description: The part parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more search resource properties that the API response will include.

relatedtovideoid.description: The ID of the video for which the related videos are being fetched.

maxresults.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 50.
